mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_ID ,PRODUCT_CATEGORY ,PRODUCT_CATEGORY_CHILD ,PRODUCT_NAME ,PRODUCT_STATUS FROM product WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (PRODUCT_CATEGORY, PRODUCT_CATEGORY_CHILD, PRODUCT_NAME, PRODUCT_STATUS) VALUES (#{productCategory}, #{productCategoryChild}, #{productName}, #{productStatus})
